description: The Sufy Club of Chitkara University is a literary club involved in variety of activities aimed at building up the confidence and grooming the talents of students in facing various interpersonal activities and competitions. It is a voluntary association of students interested in writing, speaking and expressing their original views and ideas on the various platforms.

portfolio.name: It doesn't matter if you're good with words or not,give it a chance.You never know you might spell your way to Glory with these lucrative Cash prizes! CLUB SUFY is organising A Spelling Bee competition on the 6th of April 2016.
S.U.F.Y. is going to organize a declamation competition on Tuesday i.e. 3rd November 2015 as per the details given :-Topic : “Communalism a threat to India’s Unity”. Time : 5th hour Venue :102
Presents India`s youngest motivator Mr. Pankaj Asija at Chitkara University on World Students` day. He will teach time and stress management, communication skills
